attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make St. George's day (23rd April), or nearest Friday or Monday to it , if it falls on a Saturday or Sunday a Bank Holiday in England.

rejection.details:
The title of the petition should be a call to action, not your name. However, there is already an answer to this petition (see http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/ST-GEORGES/ ) and another petition asking for events at
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stgeorgeevents/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
